name: 黃昭勳
objective:
1.Biaxial Bending of Columns
2.Long Column Effects
3.Moment-Resisting Frames
4.Shear Walls
5.Two-way Slabs – Direct Design Method*
schedule:
0-2 Biaxial Bending of Columns
3 Long Column Effects
4-9 Two-way Slabs – Direct Design Method
10 Midterm
11-16 Moment-Resisting Frames 
17 Shear Walls
18 Final
materials:
1.ACI Committee 318, “Building Code Requirements for Structural Concrete and Commentary (ACI 318-11) ,” American Concrete Institute, Farmington Hills, MI, 2011.
2.James G. MacGregor and James K. Wright, “Reinforced Concrete – Mechanics and Design,” 6th Ed., Prentice Hall, 2012.
3.T. Paulay and M.J.N. Priestley, “Seismic Design of Reinforce Concrete and Masonry Buildings,” Wiley, 1992.
4.Other undergraduate RC textbook(s).
